# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(exodus LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(exodus "")
set_target_properties(exodus PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "exodus")
set_target_properties(exodus PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/macosx/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(exodus PRIVATE
    /usr/local/include
)
target_include_directories(exodus PRIVATE
    /Users/iustus/vcpkg/installed/x64-osx/include
    /usr/local/Cellar/openssl@3/3.1.1/include
    /usr/local/opt/zlib/include
    /usr/local/Cellar/libsodium/1.0.18_1/include
    /usr/local/Cellar/opus/1.3.1/include/opus
)
target_compile_options(exodus PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-target>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-target>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:x86_64-apple-macos12.6>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:x86_64-apple-macos12.6>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX13.1.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX13.1.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
set_target_properties(exodus PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(exodus PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(exodus PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(exodus PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(exodus PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET exodus PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(exodus PRIVATE
    dpp
    ssl
    crypto
    z
    sodium
    opus
    z
)
target_link_directories(exodus PRIVATE
    /Users/iustus/vcpkg/installed/x64-osx/lib
    /usr/local/Cellar/openssl@3/3.1.1/lib
    /usr/local/opt/zlib/lib
    /usr/local/Cellar/libsodium/1.0.18_1/lib
    /usr/local/Cellar/opus/1.3.1/lib
)
target_link_options(exodus PRIVATE
    -target
    x86_64-apple-macos12.6
    -isysroot
    /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX13.1.sdk
    -stdlib=libc++
)
target_sources(exodus PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)
